Arrow: The Maximals wouldn't allow them to attack their allies, so they may=
 leave the Maximals. That would mean that they wouldn't be able to attack f=
or a while, because they would need to build a base. The idea works, doesn'=
t it?...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 1:26 PM
  Subject: Re:=
 Chivtron Decisions


  ::Aerotaur::
      He tilts his head at Grounded, "=
So your word is law?  No matter."  He 
  smirks and turns back to Sarge and=
 glares.  "We will have to decide this 
  later."  He paces around the room=
, until Arrow speaks up.  "I hadn't noticed 
  that they were Maximals howe=
ver, I still think we should work with them.  For 
  one thing they owe us =
for aiding in the protection of their base on one, 
  perhaps two occasions=
, and we saved one of their pods from the Alliance.  
  They should be ... =
receptive."

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yah=
oo.com/info/terms/
